item.title: TgCYP76AE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TgCYP76AE2 Gene Name: Thapsia garganica cytochrome P450 Genome: Species: Thapsia garganica Functional Descriptions: We present the putative second step in thapsigargin biosynthesis, by showing that the cytochrome P450 TgCYP76AE2, transiently expressed in Nicotiana benthamiana, converts epikunzeaol into epidihydrocostunolide.
